item.title: A Sinful Smile
item.author: Author
item.description: I walked a space when i couldn’t walk time, I walked alone when i couldn’t control my mind. I stopped to pick up the fallen leaves, Then I walked again with a sinful smile. I covered my ears when i felt my tears, I covered my eyes when i couldn’t help my deeds, I covered my mouth when it could be helped… Then I covered my face with a sinful smile.
